summary: A test suite that validates the HunyuanDiTPAGPipeline with PAG optimizations, covering component access, inference correctness, layer activation control, model serialization, and CPU offloading behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and performance of the HunyuanDiT pipeline with PAG enhancements for production use, enabling early detection of regressions and ensuring correct functionality across different execution environments.
